short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a Twitch chat tab to blast.tv

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to quickly and easily get access to a Twitch chat, directly from blast.tv. Don't want to miss the action happening on Twitch, but prefer the ad-free experience from Blast? Simply click one button and you'll be able to enjoy all your favorite Twitch features without leaving the site.
